# define qc color scheme

```{r}
  colors <- tibble::data_frame(qc = c("ok", "maybe", "bad"),
                               color= c("#009E73", "#56B4E9", "#E69F00"))

  qc_colors <- colors$color
  names(qc_colors) <- colors$qc

  saveRDS(qc_colors, file = "../../r_data/qc_colors.RDS")
```

# define lod shape scheme

```{r}
  shapes <- tibble::data_frame(lod = c("above", "below"),
                               shape = c(16, 17))

  lod_shapes <- shapes$shape
  names(lod_shapes) <- shapes$lod

  saveRDS(lod_shapes, file = "../../r_data/lod_shapes.RDS")
```
